description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Remote Access Connection Manager (CVE-2024-30079):

1. Download and install the appropriate update package for your version of Windows from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system is connected to the internet during the update process.
3. Restart your system to complete the installation of the updates.

**Details**:
- The relevant KB articles for this fix include KB5040442, KB5040431, and KB5040427 for different Windows builds. 
- For manual installation, you can access the update packages through the following links:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
- It's essential to ensure that you are applying the correct update corresponding to your operating system version.

**Preconditions**:
- Make sure to note your current Windows version and build number before proceeding with the update. 
- Backup critical data before applying system updates to prevent data loss in case of any issues.
